title: Shiba Inu Holders Migrating To New Crypto ICO Built For Traders To Hunt 1249% ROI Tokens
content: With Shiba Inu’s price performance lagging lately, down 2.46% year-to-year, seasoned crypto investors are shifting focus to new opportunities. This growing appetite for undiscovered crypto gems is directing attention toward Launchpad XYZ’s new crypto ICO and its upcoming $LPX token launch in nine days.

Looking for these top crypto trades is exactly what the AI-powered trading tools platform is being built for. As an all-in-one gateway for crypto trading and Web3 services, Launchpad will simplify trading for newcomers while providing advanced tools for experienced investors to find the best cryptos to buy in the new crypto bull cycle in 2024,

Having raised $2.5 million in its crypto ICO round already, Launchpad XYZ is seeing high demand thanks to its upcoming suite of AI-powered features. The cornerstone offering Launchpad Quotient (LPQ) will use AI to analyze and rank crypto assets across 400 data points. For traders overwhelmed by volatility, Launchpad promises to provide actionable insights to inform crypto and NFT purchases.

Additionally, Launchpad XYZ will allow users to tap into the strategies of professional traders through its Trading Edge tool. By examining setups based on news events, social media chatter, and other real-time data points, novice investors can learn techniques used by smart money.

Beyond AI analytics, Launchpad XYZ is also working on offering portfolio management features, a decentralized exchange, gaming tools, and a Metaverse discovery engine. The broad scope of offerings has gained the attention of experienced traders.
Bullish experts project $LPX could generate substantial ROI upwards of 10-100x for early adopters, not to mention the potential to use the platform to find the next Shiba Inu.

The surge in AI crypto tokens, now topping $23 billion market capitalization per CoinMarketCap, also signals potential tailwinds. With the crypto ICO ending in nine days, interested investors may want to act quickly before LPX lists on exchanges.

Those committing funds to the presale can also unlock exclusive NFT passes for additional perks like access to Launchpad’s VIP Telegram channel. The popular channel shares actionable alpha trades, many already yielding over 1000% returns for members.

As a new platform striving to onboard Web3’s next 10 million users, Launchpad XYZ’s versatile offerings and AI tools make it a project to watch in 2024’s anticipated crypto bull market as it wraps up its successful crypto ICO.

This potential is further highlighted by the new wave of interest from a broad range of investors looking for the next hidden crypto gems, including those previously focused on tokens like Shiba Inu. The countdown is on for the full launch of $LPX trading just over a week away.
